tired: Tired of lengthy budgeting process? Curious how to make it differently?
thinking: Thinking of transforming your finance department?
desire: Hoping for true finance business partnering? Still not there yet?
ambitions: Ambition for a big project but not having the right people?
missing: Lacking an experienced senior person to help you during difficult times?
wishing: Wishing to streamline internal processes which annoys and slows you down?
